text: Nivu avarannu kandaga avara sariragalu nimage candaganuttave. Avaru matanadidarendare nivu avara matannu keluttale iruttiri. Adare avara sthitiyu godege oragisida halageyante, tira baradagide. Yavudadaru dodda sabdavu kelisidodane, avaru adannu, tam'ma virud'dha (eno apattu eragalide) endu bhavisuttare. Avaru satrugalu. Avara kuritu eccaravagiri. Allahanu avarannu nasa madali. Avaru adelli aleyuttiddare
